Ratings.comment: Very funny and easy going. There are not many grades so make sure to study well for what is given. Good instructor but is often prone to excessive repetition of concepts in class. If you want to do well study vocab and lessons outside of class as most are not assigned or checked.
Bulent is a fun and engaging professor that you will enjoy tremendously. His classes seem almost too easy but you'll find yourself able to speak Turkish clearly after he's done with you.
Great professor. Interested and interesting. EXTREMELY easy-going and understanding. Incorporates Turkish culture and encourages use of Turkish.

Bülent is likely one of the best language professors at OSU. He is patient, easy-going, and yet still expects us to work hard. He varies his routine every day, and he keeps us interested in the material. He also provides opportunities for us to learn outside the classroom. He is a genuinely good teacher and a genuinely good guy.
